text: Chadli Bendjedid (; ALA-LC: ash-Shādhilī bin Jadīd; 14 April 1929 – 6 October 2012) was the third President of Algeria from 9 February 1979 to 11 January 1992. Bendjedid was hospitalized in Paris in January 2012 for cancer treatment and returned to hospital again in May and October 2012. He died of cancer on 6 October 2012 in Paris. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Presidents of Algeria Category:Cancer deaths in France
title: Chadli Bendjedid
